text: @RepMarkGreen @SpeakerPelosi @realDonaldTrump Trump’s endless and reckless fucking lies, denials of responsibility for anything, utterly incompetent response to the covid19 crisis, his idiotic nepotistic appointment of Jared Fucking Kushner to head up the response...damn RIGHT he should be investigated. #FuckTrump.
